00082 typedef enum {
00083   icSeekSet=0,  //Seek to an absolute position
00084   icSeekCur,    //Seek to relative position
00085   icSeekEnd,     //Seek relative to the ending
00086 } icSeekVal;
00087 
00096 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccIO  
00097 {
00098 public:
00099 
00100   virtual ~CIccIO() {}
00101 
00102   virtual void Close() {}
00103 
00104   virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf8, icInt32Number nNum=1) { return 0; }
00105   virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf8, icInt32Number nNum=1) { return 0; }
00106 
00107   icInt32Number ReadLine(void *pBuf8, icInt32Number nNum=256);
00108 
00109   icInt32Number Read16(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00110   icInt32Number Write16(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00111 
00112   icInt32Number Read32(void *pBuf32, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00113   icInt32Number Write32(void *pBuf32, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00114 
00115   icInt32Number Read64(void *pBuf64, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00116   icInt32Number Write64(void *pBuf64, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00117 
00118   icInt32Number Read8Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00119   icInt32Number Write8Float(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00120 
00121   icInt32Number Read16Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00122   icInt32Number Write16Float(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00123 
00124   icInt32Number ReadFloat32Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00125   icInt32Number WriteFloat32Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00126 
00127   virtual icInt32Number GetLength() {return 0;}
00128 
00129   virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos) {return -1;}
00130   virtual icInt32Number Tell() {return 0;}
00131 
00133   bool Align32(); 
00134 
00136   bool Sync32(icUInt32Number nOffset=0); 
00137 };
00138 
00146 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccFileIO : public CIccIO
00147 {
00148 public:
00149   CIccFileIO();
00150   virtual ~CIccFileIO();
00151 
00152   bool Open(const icChar *szFilename, const icChar *szAttr);
00153 #ifdef WIN32
00154   bool Open(const icWChar *szFilename, const icWChar *szAttr);
00155 #endif
00156   virtual void Close();
00157 
00158   virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00159   virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00160 
00161   virtual icInt32Number GetLength();
00162 
00163   virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos);
00164   virtual icInt32Number Tell();
00165 
00166 protected:
00167   FILE *m_fFile;
00168 };
00169 
00177 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccMemIO : public CIccIO
00178 {
00179 public:
00180   CIccMemIO();
00181   virtual ~CIccMemIO();
00182 
00183   bool Alloc(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bWrite = false);
00184 
00185   bool Attach(icUInt8Number *pData, icUInt32Number nSize, bool bWrite=false);
00186   virtual void Close();
00187 
00188   virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00189   virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00190 
00191   virtual icInt32Number GetLength();
00192 
00193   virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos);
00194   virtual icInt32Number Tell();
00195 
00196   icUInt8Number *GetData() { return m_pData; }
00197 
00198 protected:
00199   icUInt8Number *m_pData;
00200   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00201   icUInt32Number m_nAvail;
00202   icUInt32Number m_nPos;
00203 
00204   bool m_bFreeData;
00205 };

00214 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccNullIO : public CIccIO
00215 {
00216 public:
00217   CIccNullIO();
00218   virtual ~CIccNullIO();
00219 
00220   //Open resets the file to being zero size
00221   void Open();
00222   virtual void Close();
00223 
00224 
00225   virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);   //Read zero's into buf
00226   virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
00227 
00228   virtual icInt32Number GetLength();
00229 
00230   virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos);
00231   virtual icInt32Number Tell();
00232 
00233 protected:
00234   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00235   icUInt32Number m_nPos;
00236 };
